author: jenny c
title: A great Hotel, but with some minor flaw
text: What to say? We stayed for two nights, we were treated in a very professional and extremely polite way. All the receptionist knew perfectly our language (italian), so that when we checked in, they explained in the most clear way all the rules/timetables. The structure is about 100 meters or less frome the subway, and the neighbourhood is lively and full of restaurant. There is also a Supermarket and a beautiful curch just around the corner! The room was very comfortable, equipped with an electric kettle, two cups, some teabags, a hair dryer and an iron with ironing board. The bathroom was large and "cozy". BUT, there were two factors which quite runied our stay: first of all, the extremely high temperature in the room (even the A/C was not enough to lower it), which undermined our sleep quality, and the noise coming from the hallway, which is probably due to a "bad-noise-isolated" door. Still, I would absolutely reccomend this Hotel, since its "pros" are so much more than its "cons".
